sourcesContent: import { memo, useContext } from 'react' import { CommonDataForAllViewService } from '../ViewInformationDetailService' import { englishWeekDays, vietnameseWeekDays } from '../../Languages/WeekDays' import { english, vietnamese } from '../../Languages/InformationEntertainment' import Select from 'react-select' function ViewInformationEntertainment({ languageSelected }) { const service = useContext(CommonDataForAllViewService) const weekDaysList = languageSelected === 'EN' ? englishWeekDays : vietnameseWeekDays const languageList = languageSelected === 'EN' ? english : vietnamese return (
